data.name: save the princess
data.detailed_description:
main play

The princess was caught by a group of monkeys. You need to control a monkey to save the princess through many obstacles. In this process, we also need to constantly explore the terrain to find and collect hidden stars. The more stars you collect, the more CG you unlock. After unlocking all CG, you can pass the customs!

operating instructions

The left and right arrows control the movement, and the up arrow climbs. The space bar can jump. If the monkey can jump in the air, the "X" key can attack. There are many props in the game to help you collect stars, such as wings to let you take off in place.

features

There are three roles in CG, namely "sunny", "enriching Fox" and "Sandy";
”Sunny "is a woman with a double ponytail. With beautiful brown hair and her lovely face, you will fall in love with her at a glance!

”Enchanting Fox "is a pair of lilies with a pair of White Velvet ears. Don't miss it.

"Sandy" is a golden lady. Whether it's a luxury car or a gold necklace around her neck, she can show her worth. Silver white high heels and sapphire hair exude unparalleled temperament all the time.

data.short_description: ”Save the princess "is a breakthrough game. Players need to play a monkey to save the princess. After each successful rescue, they will unlock the animation of three sexy women.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese*, Italian*, Spanish - Spain*, Russian*, Korean*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: window7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel I5 2500
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 128M
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Joshua scs(10K2+XP+W7)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: window10
  • Processor: Intel I5 9400 or i7 8700
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
